description:
The biggest historical battle in all of Warhammer 40k - the Siege of Terra - is also one of the hardest to play out fully on the tabletop, due to its vast planet-wide scale and the sheer numbers of warriors involved. Nevertheless, Games Night - tabletop games offshoot of YouTube mega-channel The Yogscast - gave it a bash in their latest video battle report, using classic, tiny-scale Warhammer Epic models from the early 90s.
